p: Table 3 shows the list of studies on the antioxidant effects of genus Gynura. Several potential mechanisms for the antioxidant activity of Gynura are suggested as follows: inhibition of ROS, inhibition of lipid peroxidation, modulation of enzymatic antioxidant production or activities, and modulation of GSH-related parameters. Figure 2 illustrates the proposed signaling pathways of antioxidant effects by Gynura species.
